subject: p12530259
History: Lobectomy with left upper lobe collapse following post-bronchoscopy.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is some improved aeration in the medial aspect of the left lung. However, substantial opacification persists in this hemithorax. Right lung remains clear.
